imdb.plot outline: This documentary reconstructs great moments in the history of the city of Queretaro, including: its legendary foundation (1531); economic development in the 17th and 18th centuries, which left behind the priceless imprint of Baroque art; the Queretaro Conspiracy of 1808-10; the city as capital of Mexico during the U.S. invasion of 1847-48; the Fall of the Second Empire; the Constitutional Congress of 1916-17; and last but not least, the culture Queretaro has to offer even today, which one and all are welcome to enjoy.
imdb.title: Querétaro, a través de los siglos
akas: Querétaro, a través de los siglos (Mexico)
plot: This documentary reconstructs great moments in the history of the city of Queretaro, including: its legendary foundation (1531); economic development in the 17th and 18th centuries, which left behind the priceless imprint of Baroque art; the Queretaro Conspiracy of 1808-10; the city as capital of Mexico during the U.S. invasion of 1847-48; the Fall of the Second Empire; the Constitutional Congress of 1916-17; and last but not least, the culture Queretaro has to offer even today, which one and all are welcome to enjoy.::Clío TV
